urls.title: Current Openings - Careers
urls.description: Download Advertisement Notice: - In terms of para “G” of the advertisement, the selection of candidates for both the posts will be done through “Shortlisting and Interview” instead of “Online written test & interview” (NEW) State Bank of India provides many opportunities for young graduates as well as experienced professionals for accelerated career growth. Discover all the opportunities below to join the largest bank of the country and work in an exciting, motivating, meritocratic and truly collaborative
